thread.title: The Best Ryan Gosling Memes from the 2017 Oscars - Ryan Gosling Tourist Reaction Meme 2017 Oscars
thread.title_full: The Best Ryan Gosling Memes from the 2017 Oscars - Ryan Gosling Tourist Reaction Meme 2017 Oscars

author: Erica Gonzales
title: The Best Ryan Gosling Memes from the 2017 Oscars - Ryan Gosling Tourist Reaction Meme 2017 Oscars
text:
Last night at the Oscars, host Jimmy Kimmel pranked some unsuspecting tourists when he surprised them with a Hollywood tour that turned out to be a trip to the Academy Awards. The group entered the Dolby Theater with a mix of surprise and joy as they said hi to Jennifer Aniston, touched Mahershala Ali's Oscar and tried some of the guests' candies. They also got to indulge in the highest honor of the evening, meeting Ryan Gosling. One woman (who came readily equipped with a selfie stick) was especially enthusiastic about the impromptu meet-and-greet, and naturally, the internet promptly turned the moment into a meme. Here are some of the best ones. It all started when Gosling and the tourist had an interesting exchange.
gosling literally had her SHOOK and ready to dump her fiancé on live television lmao #oscars pic.twitter.com/v4KSO8ABFY
— joe malunda™ (@maloonds) February 27, 2017
